about_the_game:
Join players worldwide in sweeping through 10 million mines across a 48 million tile minefield and leave your mark! The "Mystic East" Skin Pack I brings you a variety of game interfaces and flag options, giving you a unique Minesweeper experience.

With the distant sun casting a golden hue over the rolling hills, feel like you're in a wonderland while sweeping mines. Come and enjoy this Minesweeper journey filled with Eastern charm!

Unlock the following content with the "Mystic East" DLC Skin Pack I :

1. A set of traditional Chinese-themed top, tile surface, and tile bottom
2. 10 different flag skins
3. An exclusive "Cool Mine" emoji
4. 10,000 points (redeemable for free skins)

DLC Instructions

1. After purchasing this DLC from the Steam store, the content will be automatically unlocked and available upon logging into the game.
2. Players who purchase the DLC in-game need to restart the game to access the DLC content.

With the distant sun casting a golden hue over the rolling hills, feel like you're in a wonderland while sweeping mines. Come and enjoy this Minesweeper journey filled with Eastern charm!

2. Players who purchase the DLC in-game need to restart the game to access the DLC content.
